      • returnMLE_of_q_in_Q

        public float returnMLE_of_q_in_Q(java.lang.String[] qTerms,
                                 java.lang.String qTerm)
        Returns MLE of a query term q in Q;

        P(w|Q) = tf(w,Q)/|Q|

        Parameters:
        qTerms - all query terms
        qTerm - query term under consideration
        Returns:
        MLE of qTerm in the query qTerms

      • RM1

        public java.util.HashMap RM1(TRECQuery query,
                             org.apache.lucene.search.TopDocs topDocs)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        RM1: IID Sampling

        Returns 'hashmap_PwGivenR' containing all terms of PR docs (PRD) with weights calculated using IID Sampling

        P(w|R) = \sum{d\in PRD} {smoothedMLE(w,d)*smoothedMLE(Q,d)} Reference: Relevance Based Language Model - Victor Lavrenko (SIGIR-2001)

        Parameters:
        query - The query
        topDocs - Initial retrieved document list
        Returns:
        'hashmap_PwGivenR' containing all terms of PR docs with weights
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • RM1_overloaded

        public java.util.HashMap RM1_overloaded(java.lang.String[] analyzedQuery,
                                        org.apache.lucene.search.TopDocs topDocs)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • RM3

        public java.util.HashMap RM3(TRECQuery query,
                             org.apache.lucene.search.TopDocs topDocs,
                             java.lang.String[] initialQuery)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        RM3

        P(w|R) = QueryMix*RM1 + (1-QueryMix)*P(w|Q)

        Reference: Nasreen Abdul Jaleel - TREC 2004 UMass Report

        Parameters:
        query - The query
        topDocs - Initially retrieved document list
        Returns:
        hashmap_PwGivenR: containing numFeedbackTerms expansion terms with normalized weights
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        public java.util.HashMap RM3_overloaded(java.lang.String[] analyzedQuery,
                                        org.apache.lucene.search.TopDocs topDocs,
                                        java.lang.String[] initialQuery,
                                        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,FCRLM.WordProbability> hashMap_PwGivenR_RM3)
